question_1.question: What action is suggested to resolve the error encountered when testing the connection to a new Oracle data source?

options.option_b: Remove the Oracle Native Client and install only the Oracle Data Provider
options.option_c: Update the Oracle data source credentials

question_1.explanation: The error suggests a conflict between Oracle Native Client and Oracle Data Provider. Removing the Oracle Native Client and installing only the Oracle Data Provider as per the instructions in the provided article is the recommended solution.
